languages.text: "Друзианцы — особый орден. Они учат довольствоваться малым, и сами cледуют этому принципу".
"The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."
languages.original_text: "Друзианцы — особый орден. Они учат довольствоваться малым, и сами cледуют этому принципу".

traits.locale_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “德鲁苏斯教派是个独特的修会。他们教导人们要知足常乐，他们自己也遵循这个信条。”
languages.original_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."

traits.locale_text: “德鲁苏斯教派是个独特的修会。他们教导人们要知足常乐，他们自己也遵循这个信条。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Los drusianos son una orden única. Enseñan a la gente a contentarse con poco, y son los primeros en dar ejemplo».
languages.original_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."

traits.locale_text: «Los drusianos son una orden única. Enseñan a la gente a contentarse con poco, y son los primeros en dar ejemplo».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ドルスス派は独特な教団だ。彼らは人々に少ないもので満足することを教え、自らもその原則に従っている」
languages.original_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「ドルスス派は独特な教団だ。彼らは人々に少ないもので満足することを教え、自らもその原則に従っている」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Drusianer sind ein einzigartiger Orden. Sie lehren die Leute, sich mit wenig zufrieden zu geben und folgen diesem Prinzip auch selbst."
languages.original_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Die Drusianer sind ein einzigartiger Orden. Sie lehren die Leute, sich mit wenig zufrieden zu geben und folgen diesem Prinzip auch selbst."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « L'ordre des Drusiens est tout à fait unique. De fait, ces gens suivent le principe de frugalité qu'ils prêchent à leurs adeptes. »
languages.original_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."

traits.locale_text: « L'ordre des Drusiens est tout à fait unique. De fait, ces gens suivent le principe de frugalité qu'ils prêchent à leurs adeptes. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Drususçular çok özel bir topluluktur. İnsanlara azıyla yetinmelerini öğütler ve bu prensibi kendileri de uygularlar."
languages.original_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Drususçular çok özel bir topluluktur. İnsanlara azıyla yetinmelerini öğütler ve bu prensibi kendileri de uygularlar."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Drusians are a unique order. They teach people to be content with little, and they follow that principle themselves."
